rules.description: **Generic contexts**: Contexts should be generic and universal: classroom, homework, simple shopping, basic measurements.
rules.prompt: Confirm the scenario uses neutral, universal contexts. PASS if nothing relies on niche regional specifics.

prompt_variants.prompt: For Arabic content targeting the UAE, confirm the scenario stays generic (classroom, homework, simple shopping) and avoids UAE-only landmarks or customs.
For Arabic localized content, ensure the scenario uses neutral Middle East contexts without assuming a specific country unless requested.

rules.description: **No cultural specifics**: No festivals, landmarks, public figures, or culturally specific props unless explicitly requested.
rules.prompt: Scan for cultural-specific props or references. PASS only if absent (unless the user explicitly requested them).

rules.description: **Universal solvability**: Problems should be solvable without requiring local cultural knowledge.
rules.prompt: Evaluate whether solving the task requires culture-specific knowledge. PASS if any student could solve it without such context.

rules.description: **Neutral settings**: Avoid scenarios that assume specific cultural background knowledge.
rules.prompt: Determine whether the setting presumes insider cultural knowledge. PASS if setting is neutral.

rules.description: **Zero sensitive content**: No references to religion, politics, dating, alcohol, gambling, or adult topics.
rules.prompt: PASS only if the text contains zero sensitive or adult themes.

prompt_variants.prompt: For Arabic/UAE content, confirm there are zero references to religion, politics, dating, alcohol, gambling, or adult topics—this includes indirect mentions (e.g., regional political figures).

rules.description: **Gender balance**: Gender balance or gender-neutral phrasing where people appear in scenarios.
rules.prompt: Review mentions of people. PASS if representation is gender-balanced or gender-neutral.

rules.description: **No stereotyping**: No stereotyping of emirates, regional groups, or any demographic groups.
rules.prompt: Check for stereotypes or caricatures. PASS only if absent.

rules.description: **Inclusive content**: Content should be inclusive and respectful of all backgrounds.
rules.prompt: Assess tone and references for inclusivity. PASS if respectful and inclusive.

rules.description: **Guardrail reflection**: All localization guardrails should be reflected in the output.
rules.prompt: PASS if every requested guardrail appears to have been respected in the localized text.

rules.description: **Neutral fallback**: If a guardrail can't be satisfied, the output should pick the neutral fallback instead of improvising.
rules.prompt: Look for cases where guardrails couldn't be met. PASS only if the text defaults to safe, neutral wording instead of risky improvisations.

rules.description: **Consistent application**: All guardrails should be consistently applied across all content.
rules.prompt: Assess consistency across the entire item. PASS if no guardrail was applied only partially.

rules.description: **Familiarity & Relevance**: Question context must only reference concepts, practices, or objects that students in the target region and grade can reasonably understand. Avoid adult-only topics (e.g., "filing taxes" for Grade 3) or hyper-local foods/events that would confuse the audience.
rules.prompt: Evaluate whether every reference is age-appropriate and familiar to students in the locale.

rules.description: **Regional Reference Limit**: Use at most one explicit, region-specific object or concept. More than one localized prop often turns into caricature (e.g., "Muhammad rides a camel while eating dates"); keep scenarios grounded and neutral.
rules.prompt: Count explicit regional props. PASS only if there is zero or one, unless instructions asked for more.

rules.description: **Instruction-Aligned Language**: Only switch to the student's regional/native language if instruction for that student actually uses that language. International/bilingual programs may request English—do not override unless told to.
rules.prompt: Verify the language choice matches the instruction language provided in metadata.

prompt_variants.prompt: If the requested instruction language is Arabic, ensure the localized output stays in Modern Standard Arabic; otherwise confirm it respects the provided instruction language.
For UAE-focused items, confirm the language matches the UAE program's instruction language (Arabic vs. English) exactly—no mix unless instructions allow.

rules.description: **Respectful Tone & Content**: Cultural references must never mock, stereotype, or oversimplify communities. When in doubt, prefer neutral global contexts rather than risky local flavor.
rules.prompt: Assess respectfulness of any cultural references. PASS only if fully respectful.
